name: Shawna Pelton
what_you_do: Shawna Pelton offers Cannabis Assisted Somatic Coaching, a therapeutic approach that combines the use of cannabis with somatic practices to help individuals reconnect with their bodies, explore emotions, and access deeper insights for healing.
who_you_serve: This service is aimed at individuals struggling with chronic pain, anxiety, depression, trauma, and addiction, as well as those seeking personal growth and spiritual exploration.
business_focus: Shawna Pelton offers Cannabis Assisted Somatic Coaching, a therapeutic approach that combines the use of cannabis with somatic practices to help individuals reconnect with their bodies, explore emotions, and access deeper insights for healing.
